original_text: Herod was very happy to see Jesus. He had heard about him and he had wanted to meet him for a long time. He wanted to see Jesus do something to show God's power.
korean_text: 헤롯이 예수를 보고 매우 기뻐하니 이는 그의 소문을 들었으므로 보고자 한 지 오래였고 또한 무엇이나 이적 행하심을 볼까 바랐던 연고러라

sentences.original_text: Herod was very happy to see Jesus
and he had wanted to meet him for a long time
He wanted to see Jesus do something
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예수가 무언가를 하는 것을 보고 싶었다
